Others: The Denver Nuggets are on a 3-game win streak and will face the San Antonio Spurs.
The Nuggets lead the Western Conference in assists per game (31.7) and the Spurs give up the fewest 3-pointers per game (13.2) in the Western Conference.
The Spurs have a 3-3 record in games decided by 3 points or fewer.
Jamal Murray is scoring 19.8 points per game for the Nuggets and Victor Wembanyama is averaging 25.6 points for the Spurs.
